forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 49, with temperatures rising to around 51 overnight. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
As daylight wanes in Downtown San Francisco, the skies offer a muted palette of mostly cloudy hues, casting a gentle glow over the city’s iconic landscape. The temperature drifts lazily down to a mild 49, rising just slightly like a soft sigh as nighttime approaches. A light breeze from the north northeast stirs the air, barely noticeable yet refreshing, hinting at the coolness that characterizes this time of year. The Golden Gate Bridge, shrouded in mystery, likely bears a thin veil of fog, a constant companion of the bay. While the haze may obscure distant vistas, it enhances the allure of the city, each shadowed corner whispering stories of its past.

For those venturing out this evening, layers will be your trusted companion; a light sweater or jacket will keep the chill at bay, particularly as you stroll through neighborhoods alive with the subtle warmth of gathering lights. Consider a leisurely walk along the Embarcadero, where the bracing air mingles with the salty scent of the sea, or perhaps dip into one of the cozy cafés that beckon with the promise of warm beverages. Tonight’s ambiance invites moments of reflection or quiet conversations under the watchful eye of the stars, offering a serene escape from the bustling day.
